doc:
Ann Prentiss https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ann_Prentiss 0 Ann Prentiss (November 27, 1939 – January 12, 2010) was an American actress. Prentiss had many supporting actor roles in films and television series in the 1960s, 1970s and 1980s, including Get Smart 's "The Little Black Book" and Baretta 's "Half a Million Dollar Baby". She provided the voice of an alien species in the comedy film My Stepmother Is an Alien (1988), co-starring alongside Kim Basinger and Dan Aykroyd. Her other film roles included appearances in Any Wednesday (1966), If He Hollers, Let Him Go! (1968), The Out-of-Towners (1970), and California Split (1974), opposite George Segal and Elliott Gould. In the 1967 NBC-TV series Captain Nice, created by Buck Henry, Prentiss played Police Sgt. Candy Kane, the girlfriend of the lead character, a shy chemist/superhero. Ann_Prentiss ( November_27_,_1939 – January_12_,_2010 ) was an_American_actress . Prentiss had many_supporting_actor_roles in films and television_series in the_1960s_,_1970s_and_1980s , including Get_Smart 's_" The_Little_Black_Book " and Baretta 's_"_Half a_Million_Dollar_Baby_" . She provided the_voice of an_alien_species in the_comedy_film My_Stepmother Is an_Alien_(_1988_) , co-starring alongside Kim_Basinger and Dan_Aykroyd . Her_other_film_roles included appearances in Any_Wednesday_(_1966_) , If He Hollers , Let Him Go ! (_1968_) , The_Out-of-Towners ( 1970_) , and California_Split_(_1974_) , opposite_George_Segal and Elliott_Gould . In the_1967_NBC-TV_series_Captain_Nice , created by Buck_Henry , Prentiss played Police_Sgt._Candy_Kane , the_girlfriend of the_lead_character , a_shy_chemist/superhero .
